"" : "," %> <% end %> ) } //out.println 'Rock-Packages' <% flow.each do |jobs| %> ignore(FAILURE){ parallel ( <% jobs.each_with_index do |job,i| %> { build("<%= job %>", release: "<%= flavor %>")}<%= jobs.size == (i+1) ? <% else # non-parallel builds%> <% gems.each_with_index do |gem,i| %> build("<%= gem%>", release: "<%= flavor %>") <% end %>
